definition: jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Jones will be missing from the team line-up.
sentences.chinese: 球队阵容中将没有琼斯。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith was succeeded by Mrs. Jones as treasurer.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯夫人继史密斯先生任会计。

sentences.english: Dow Jones plans to create an index for the 2010 Winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 道琼斯公司还计划为2010年冬季奥运会设立指数。

sentences.english: The police do not know who committed the crime , but they suspected Jones.
sentences.chinese: 警察不知道谁做的案，但他们怀疑琼斯。

sentences.english: Do you like Mr. Jones's [Jones'] car?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢琼斯先生的车吗？

sentences.english: David Jones rose to reply for the guests.
sentences.chinese: 大卫琼斯站起来代表来宾致答辞。

sentences.english: Jones redeemed his earlier poor performance by scoring two goals .
sentences.chinese: 琼斯射入两球方弥补其初时表现之不足。

sentences.english: As the chairman is ill, I am asking Mr Jones to act for him.
sentences.chinese: 现在主席病了，我打算请琼斯先生代理他。

sentences.english: I mean, we are 500 points on the Dow- Jones industrial average .
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是，我们在讨论道琼斯工业均指的500点。

sentences.english: At times, their communication would drop off, Mr. Jones said.
sentences.chinese: 有时候他们之间的联络会减少，琼斯说。

sentences.english: Captain Jones raised his gun and bang, another Indian bit the dust.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯上尉举起枪开了火，又一个印军被击毙了。

sentences.english: Many of Jones' old friends join his team, along with some new ones.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯的许多老战友和一些新朋友都会加入他的阵容。

sentences.english: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA 11,063, -31.79, -0.29%)  closed slightly lower on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 道琼斯工业平均指数周五收盘时小幅走低。

sentences.english: All 30 stocks in the Dow Jones industrial average fell. The index closed down 279.65 points, or 2.22 percent, at 12,290.14.
sentences.chinese: 道琼斯工业平均指数的30只股票全线下跌。

definition: Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
Brown (name)/Gordon Brown (1951-), UK politician, prime minister 2007-2010
